mutants.code:
def reverse_sentence(sentence):
    words = sentence.split('')
    reverse_words = words[::-1]
    reverse_sentence = ' '.join(reverse_words)
    return reverse_sentence

def reverse_sentence(sentence):
    words = sentence.split(' ')
    reverse_words = words[::+1]
    reverse_sentence = ' '.join(reverse_words)
    return reverse_sentence

def reverse_sentence(sentence):
    words = sentence.split(' ')
    reverse_words = words[::-1]
    reverse_sentence = ''.join(reverse_words)
    return reverse_sentence

def reverse_sentence(sentence):
    words = sentence.split(' ')
    reverse_words = words[::-2]
    reverse_sentence = ' '.join(reverse_words)
    return reverse_sentence

def reverse_sentence(sentence):
    words = sentence.split(' ')
    reverse_words = words[::-0]
    reverse_sentence = ' '.join(reverse_words)
    return reverse_sentence

def reverse_sentence(sentence):

def reverse_sentence(sentence):
    words = sentence.split(' ')
    reverse_words = words[::--1]
    reverse_sentence = ' '.join(reverse_words)
    return reverse_sentence
